title: - Our Values -
heading: Heading
subtitle: To take a trivial example, which of us ever undertakes laborious physical exercise, except to obtain some advantage from it?
subheading: To take a trivial example, which of us ever undertakes laborious physical exercise, except to obtain some advantage from it?
text: On the other hand, we denounce with righteous indignation and dislike men who are so beguiled and demoralized by the charms of pleasure of the moment, so blinded by desire, that they cannot foresee the pain and trouble that are bound to ensue; and equal blame belongs tj those who fail in their duty through weakness of will, which is the same as saying through shrinking from toil and pain.
